markdown:
| icon           = Poe2 LAX01 research seeker icon.png
| description    = Captain [Player Name],

It would be my honor to host the savior of Hasongo at the Kahanga Palace. Neketaka is a city for Huana and outsiders alike, and there is no shortage of work for kith who are determined to be as useful as you.

Should you have the stamina for a good climb, the palace atop Serpent's Crown could be your second home. Think on it.

Regards, Queen Onekaza II
